FileFormat.FormatDescription: Within Adobe Photoshop, curves allow you to adjust the entire tonal range of an image. Curve files can be saved and stored as presets.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: A curve file begins with 0x0001 or 0x0004 depending on the version in use (http://www.adobe.com/devnet-apps/photoshop/fileformatashtml/). A signature based on these sequences would be highly prone to clashing with other formats, so identification is currently based on extension only.
